data.message: So now you want to rap about politics and music? I guess you want to see your fans all lose it.  My biggest idol, slim shady,  I used to love him. Now he’s dissing on the president just to bruise the nation under God for which we stand, trying to lose the fans who gave him hands, supporting the ones who kneel than stand and making a mockery of our flag..I used to think you was the greatest rapper ever. Now I’m questioning why I ever bothered? Tell me why, why do you do this? Cause you can? I’m out, fuck you too, your biggest fan, this is Stan..

replies.message: Lady he always spoke about Presidents ...have you actually listened to his music
Oh you poor precious little snowflake.
I don't think she was ever a real fan
I'm disappointed in him calling out his fans,  however,  he has always talked about presidents.  Remember "Mosh"?

I doubt he really cares if he loses fans.  He's got more money than most of America and he still drives his H2 Hummer and is selling his mansion for less than what he paid for it.  If he was to lose every single fan it would probably be a blessing for him.  I don't doubt people haven't asked for an autograph while he is taking a shit.  He's also spoke about Bill Clinton, George Bush,Obama, and now Trump.  If I am missing anyone else please feel free to correct me.
What do you mean "now"?? I don't even listen to his music that much but I know this is not his first political song...
Gina Lanape GET OUT OF THE USA,IF YOU DONT LIKE TRUMO. Raus
